subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox have struck out 43 times in the first three games of the A.L.C.S., including 10 in eight innings against Justin Verlander in Game 3, but they have the series lead.
snippet: The Red Sox have struck out 43 times in the first three games of the A.L.C.S., including 10 in eight innings against Justin Verlander in Game 3, but they have the series lead.
